newsitem.title: USA: Raphel to tour South Asia at end of January.
newsitem.headline: Raphel to tour South Asia at end of January.

text.p: Robin Raphel, U.S. Assistant Secretary of State for South Asian Affairs, will visit Pakistan, Bangladesh, India and Sri Lanka in late January and early February, State Department officials said on Tuesday.
They said Raphel was taking advantage of a meeting of U.S. diplomatic mission chiefs in the Bangladesh capital Dhaka to tour the area.

Although Raphel will not visit Afghanistan, officials said it was possible she would meet in Pakistan with members of various Afghan factions, including the Taleban movement which took control of much of the country last September.
The officials did not have exact dates or a precise itinerary for Raphel's trip.
